page.title: 19Robert Marfleet's House
page.content: My name is Robert Marfleet and I am 11 years old. My house was built in about 1750. It has 10 rooms not including the 2 halls. Our house is made of brick. I measured some of the rooms in square feet:- the lounge is 208 sq.feet my bedroom is 90 sq.feet the kitchen is 190 sq.feet the garden is 195 sq.yards We have quite a lot of special things including a cellar, garage, barn, stables, 2 lofts and a woodshed. The value of my house is Â£50,000. I have lived in it for for 6 years. Our house was a pub and a farm, but I do not know when. It is heated by burning coke and wood which we put in the Aga. We also burn oil. We have 2 cars. One of them is a Vauxhall, and the other is a Ford.
